name: UltimateTube
tag_list: christian, videos-online, songs, sermon, malayalam, christianity, video-pic, jesuscalls, god, christ, church, malayalam-testimony, jesus-video, gospel-videos, american, bible-videos, family-videos, pentecostal, youtube-videos, julie-true, tamil-videos, te
overview:
Founded in 2007, ULTIMATETUBE.com is a new and exciting place were all Christians from around the world can share Christ in new way, using Video, forum and “Broadcast Him Alone”.

Why ULTIMATETUBE.com?

It is a free place where you can participate in a video sharing community.

ULTIMATETUBE.com is a place to learn the Bible- the awesome word of God, its a place where you can hear the word of God Preached by His anointed preachers and teachers. It’s also a place for Christian film makers to show and share their films to a world audience, and to ask questions and share ideas about Christian film making. To put it’s simply it’s and awesome place to share our love for Jesus Christ on the world’s stage.

We have the following exciting features:

Upload, tag and share videos with family and friends and the rest of the world!

Browse through unlimited videos uploaded by other community members

Join or create your own video groups enabling you to connect with other people with similar interests

Integrate your videos on other websites using embed tags

Make videos public or private when you upload to our server

Promote or integrate your videos with your friends using the latest promotional tools for MySpace, Facebook & Digg plus many others!

Did we mention this is all totally free for everyone!

milestones.description: We just crossed over 27 Million Videos views
